original_title: 1989 Walt Disney World 4th of July Spectacular
overview: The special, like the Christmas and Easter Parades, evolved over the years; and in 1989, Americaâ€™s 213th Birthday the focus was on Disney recording artists and the newly opened MGM Studios theme park.  The Spectacular kicks off at Washington Square, New York, New York, or in this case, at Walt Disney World MGM Studios.
title: 1989 Walt Disney World 4th of July Spectacular
